languages.text: Притесненный работяга молит РТ о милости — не отбирать у него честно заработанные пайковые талоны

{n}Побитый разнорабочий бросается вам под ноги и касается грязными руками носка вашего сапога.{/n} "Милостив{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, длань Бога-Императора, Ваша Светлость! Спасите слугу своего недостойного!"

{n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"
languages.original_text: {n}Побитый разнорабочий бросается вам под ноги и касается грязными руками носка вашего сапога.{/n} "Милостив{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, длань Бога-Императора, Ваша Светлость! Спасите слугу своего недостойного!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The battered workman throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

{n}The battered workman throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

{n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

{n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

languages.text: {n}El trabajador maltratado se lanza a tus pies y toca la puntera de tu bota con sus manos sucias.{/n} «¡Mi generos{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}! ¡Mano del Dios Emperador! ¡Salve a su indigno sirviente!».
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El trabajador maltratado se lanza a tus pies y toca la puntera de tu bota con sus manos sucias.{/n} «¡Mi generos{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}! ¡Mano del Dios Emperador! ¡Salve a su indigno sirviente!».

languages.text: {n}ボロボロな身なりの労働者があなたの足元に身を投げ出し、汚れた手のひらであなたのブーツのつま先に触れる。{/n}「偉大なる閣下！神帝陛下の御手！不甲斐ないこの下僕をお救いください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ボロボロな身なりの労働者があなたの足元に身を投げ出し、汚れた手のひらであなたのブーツのつま先に触れる。{/n}「偉大なる閣下！神帝陛下の御手！不甲斐ないこの下僕をお救いください！」

languages.text: {n}遭到毒打的工人扑倒在你的脚边，用他肮脏的手掌触摸你的靴尖。{/n}“仁慈的大人啊！神皇之手！求您救救您卑贱的仆人吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}遭到毒打的工人扑倒在你的脚边，用他肮脏的手掌触摸你的靴尖。{/n}“仁慈的大人啊！神皇之手！求您救救您卑贱的仆人吧！”

languages.text: {n}Der malträtierte Arbeiter wirft sich dir zu Füßen und berührt die Kappe deines Stiefels mit seinem schmutzigen Handflächen.{/n} "Gnädigste {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Hand des Gottimperators! Rettet Euren unwürdigen Diener!"
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der malträtierte Arbeiter wirft sich dir zu Füßen und berührt die Kappe deines Stiefels mit seinem schmutzigen Handflächen.{mf| "Gnädigste {/n}Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Hand des Gottimperators! Rettet Euren unwürdigen Diener!"

languages.text: {n}L'ouvrier malmené se jette à vos pieds et touche le bout de vos bottes de ses paumes sales.{/n} « Votre gracieuse Seigneurie ! Main de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Sauvez votre indigne serviteur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ouvrier malmené se jette à vos pieds et touche le bout de vos bottes de ses paumes sales.{/n} « Votre gracieuse Seigneurie ! Main de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Sauvez votre indigne serviteur ! »

languages.text: {n}Perişan hâldeki işçi, ayaklarına kapanarak kirli avuçlarıyla botunun burnuna dokunuyor.{/n} "Muhterem {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tanrı İmparator'un eli! Bu değersiz hizmetkârınızı kurtarın!"
languages.original_text: {n}The battered worker throws himself at your feet and touches the toe of your boot with his dirty palms.{/n} "Your gracious {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Hand of the God-Emperor! Save your unworthy servant!"
